text: When descending Moses from Mount Sinai broke the tablets of the Law and the walls of the city were first broken
Ezekiel in captivity heard and all the people of the captives in the fifth month the Temple was overthrown
The fast of the fourth month and the fast of the fifth and the fast of the seventh and the fast of the tenth shall be to the house of Judah joy and gladness and cheerful feasts
let us go and sacrifice before the Lord, and three times in the year all the males appear before the Lord
